channel.title: How to make homework more enjoyable!
channel.description:
[b][u]WAYS OF MAKING HOMEWORK enjoyable:[/u][/b]
1) play Some music while your doing your homework Time will soon fly 2) Buy a chocolate bar and every 10 minutes of homework you do You eat a bit of chocolate 3) If your teacher lets you. write of a different colour paper 4) Say every 30mins of homework you do you get 30 mins Of computer time 5) Do homework on the computer (nobody likes writing) (ideal for Essays)
[b][u]Things you shouldnt do while doing homework:[/u][/b] 1) watch TV you can easly get distracted! 2) Be with friends on Mobile Or chat sites while doing homework 3) Overthink homework try and find a simple way of doing it 4) Playing GAMES 5) Rushing homework - your teacher will just ask you to do it again depending on the teacher, for good quality homework can be rewarding like MERITS OR TEAM POINTS, PRAISE LETTERS, OR EVEN MONEY AND SWEETS!!!!!
Just a few of my tips.

item.title: How to make homework more enjoyable!
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:20, topic:261942”][quote author=Kane. link=topic=345935.msg2676717#msg2676717 date=1235110814]
His website is Teenzone… http://teenzone.smfforfree.com/

WHERE HAVE I SEEN THIS BEFORE?
Didn’t some idiot leave in rage and advertised that website, then we flooded it? By we I mean 2 members of the forums…
I recognize it and the name.
[/quote]
Nice work, detective[/quote]

Nice work detective, no go lose your virginity.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make homework more enjoyable!

item.title: How to make homework more enjoyable!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

I have found recently that a great deal of procrastination has nonspecific instructions as the root cause. It’s one thing to say “Do your homework”, but quite another to specify what “Doing your homework” actually entails. Since the specific process for each different assignment (Or even different parts of a single assignment) is different, it has to be figured out on a case-by-case basis.

This is where the common methodology “Just do it” falls flat on its face.

See also: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,343539.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: How to make homework more enjoyable!
